Uses of Class
fotoshop.Events.EventController

  • Packages that use EventController 
    Package Description
    fotoshop
    fotoshop package contains the primary image editor and various command processing methods.
    fotoshop.Events
    The Events package contains classes related to the applications controller.
    fotoshop.GUI
    Package containing the graphical user interface components of the application.
    fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar
    Package containing the components for the GUI Jframes JMenuBar, and the specific Dialog window JPanels for each filter that may be applied.
    fotoshop.GUI.SequencePanel
    Package containing the components for the sequence panel: A panel allowing one of a number of sequences of filters to be applied to the image, and the creation of new sequences.
